Room.Name: Plasnelt Lake Middle Depths
Room.ShortDescription: You are in near the middle of the vast underwater civilization.
Room.LongDescription: The center depths of the vast Plasnelt Lake are guarded by armies of sahuagin warriors, protecting their homes. The sahuagin are vicious creatures of malace who dine on the flesh of the surface dwelling races. A large rock formation prevents you from going further down from this location.
